Maternal and child health problems should be listed.
To ensure that problems and underlying causes stay infocus for planning effective programme support and to havecommon terms of reference, they should be written down.
Opportunites and limitations should be identified.
There are factors which may pose as opportunities orlimitations in carrying out strategies and activities.
